hints.content:
Let's use a place value chart to write $\tealD{\text{seven thousand,}} \blueD{\text{ eight hundred}} \purpleD{\text{ twenty-}}\greenD{\text{one}}$ in standard form.

Thousands | Hundreds | Tens |  Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:
$\tealD7$ | $\blueD8$ | $\purpleD2$ | $\greenD1$

In standard form, we write $\tealD{\text{seven thousand,}}$$\blueD{\text{ eight hundred}} \purpleD{\text{ twenty-}}\greenD{\text{one}}$ as $\tealD7{,}\blueD8\purpleD2\greenD1$.

Now, let's use a place value chart to write $7{,}821$ in expanded form.

Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: |:-:
$\tealD7$ | $\blueD8$ | $\purpleD2$ | $\greenD1$

$7{,}821=\tealD{7{,}000}+\blueD{800}+\purpleD{20}+\greenD{1}$

The following are equivalent to seven thousand, eight hundred twenty-one:  

- $7{,}000+800+20 +1$
- $7{,}821$

question.content:
**Which $2$ of the following are equivalent to "seven thousand, eight hundred twenty-one"?**
